description_for_human: This plugin utilizes the power of large AI models to perform automatic annotation on input texts.
description_for_model:
Plugin for auto annotation. The plugin accepts input text and performs several operations using large AI models. The operations include text_classification, entity_extraction and translation.
 The text_classification operation classifies the input into several categories like sentiment_analysis, news_categorization, intent_recognition and more. The entity_extraction operation identifies and extracts entities such as address, name, type, start_time, end_time and more from the input. Lastly, the translation operation translates all the processed information into Chinese. The plugin ensures the processed information is accurate and is presented in a structured manner facilitating easy understanding for users who speak Chinese.
